text: Fantastic Four is a 2015 American superhero movie based on the Marvel Comics comic Fantastic Four. The movie was released in the United States on August 7, 2015. It was very poorly received by both audiences and critics. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2015 action movies Category:2015 science fiction movies Category:2010s superhero movies Category:2010s American action movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies based on comic book characters Category:Movies produced by Simon Kinberg Category:Movies set in the 2000s Category:Screenplays by Simon Kinberg Category:Superhero drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Fantastic Four movies Category:Reboot movies
title: Fantastic Four (2015 movie)
